mapper.insert: insert into member_table (memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberMobile, fileAttached) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberMobile}, #{fileAttached})
insert into member_memberprofile_table (originalFileName, storedFileName, memberId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select id, memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, concat(substr(memberMobile, 1, 3), '-', substr(memberMobile, 4, 4), '-', substr(memberMobile, 8, 4)) as memberMobile, fileAttached from member_table order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select * from member_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) from member_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
mapper.update: update member_table set memberEmail= #{memberEmail}, memberPassword = #{memberPassword}, memberName = #{memberName}, memberMobile = #{memberMobile}, fileAttached = #{fileAttached} where id = #{id}
